I started using a mac in the third year, and had no issues. Many of my friends used macs for all 4 years. No real issues at all.

You can pretty much run whatever you need - IDEs, Anaconda, Apache (Hadoop, Hive, Kafka, etc), DBs (SQL, Mongo, etc.) of the top of my head without any issues. Sometimes it can be kind of annoying to configure some of these environments, thatâ€™s the only problem I would say.

The only time I ever noticed an issue was this EDM production workshop we had in our first year. My friends couldnâ€™t setup the FL Studio environment given to us on their macs so they had to watch while the rest of us learnt how to make a basic EDM track lol.
No extra costing for these softwares ?
Nope, never once paid for any software, environment, plugin, whatever during my 4 years at PESU
Okay so you didn't face any problem expect in first year once
The first year thing was just a funny moment. That was just some cool one day workshop that happened. Not related to any class. So no problems at all

Mac user for a long time. Never really faced an issue with anything all this while, instead made a lot of stuff easier for me. Just make sure to invest in a top model and more memory since you cant really extend it later without causing some damage. If you do plan to get into fields like AR then itâ€™s best to use GPU heavy laptops instead.
